attributes.action: stop cannabis been on this new drug driving law 2nd march 2015
attributes.additional_details: cannabis should not be in this new law heroin and valium are the ones mainly they should be checkin for. cannabis helps people with aches and pains also helps me with my epilepsy it should be legalized one death weve heard of with cannabis what about all the other deaths from drink , heroin and diazepam also  if this is the case alcohol should be illegal just coz they get tax on it phhhh its gunna cost the government a lot more  money wen people r on sick as they cant work just for havin a joint for bed
